name: Paintist - Coloring Book
description:
Get relaxation and enjoy fun in this color by number & coloring book game!

Paintist (A Free Coloring Book & Paint By Number Game) is an innovative casual and art drawing game to color awesome artworks with coloring by numbers. It provides many beautiful artworks for free, you can choose your favorite pictures and follow the numbers to paint freely. Coloring draw has never been so easy!
Now, enjoy coloring pictures by numbers in an exquisite coloring book and release your inner artist for free!

Key Features:
▸ Color by number anytime – no pencil or paper needed. This is your pocket coloring book in anywhere.
▸ So many artworks to choose from Fantasy, Cartoon, Daily life, Mandala, Motto, Cute baby, Pattern, Plant, and many others.
▸ Get the color hints if you can’t find a tiny hard-to-find cell, color by number can be more easy and fun.
▸ Share with friends with your colored pictures.
▸ Daily new pictures: New and fresh coloring artworks will be updated every day!

We are constantly adding new coloring pages for you, hope you can relax and enjoy the coloring life with color by number! Enjoy the fun from the secret garden book and mandala coloring book.

Welcome your feedback, please contact us: colorfunapps@gmail.com
